# Data Source: auth0_prompt_screen_renderers

Data source to retrieve Auth0 prompt rendering settings with optional filtering by prompt, screen, and rendering_mode. Supports pagination.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `prompt` (String) Filter by prompt type name (supports wildcards). Leave empty to retrieve all prompts.
- `rendering_mode` (String) Filter by rendering mode. Options are: `standard`, `advanced`.
- `screen` (String) Filter by screen name (supports wildcards). Leave empty to retrieve all screens.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
- `renderings` (List of Object) List of prompt rendering settings matching the filter criteria. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--renderings))

<a id="nestedatt--renderings"></a>
### Nested Schema for `renderings`

Read-Only:

- `context_configuration` (Set of String)
- `default_head_tags_disabled` (Boolean)
- `filters` (List of Object) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedobjatt--renderings--filters))
- `head_tags` (String)
- `prompt` (String)
- `rendering_mode` (String)
- `screen` (String)
- `tenant` (String)
- `use_page_template` (Boolean)

<a id="nestedobjatt--renderings--filters"></a>
### Nested Schema for `renderings.filters`

Read-Only:

- `clients` (String)
- `domains` (String)
- `match_type` (String)
- `organizations` (String)
